contents.narration: Welcome to the world of dogs and cats. Would you like to be a dog, or a cat?

utterances: i want to be a dog
i want to be a cat

contents.narration:
Good choice! A {animalType} is a great battler.
    ||
    Way to go! everyone loves a {animalType}!
    ||
    I would have picked the {animalType} too.
Welcome back to your adventure. Would you like to pick up where you last left off?
Thanks for playing.
Thanks for playing. You can say start over to try again, or quit to exit the game.

parameters.message: Thanks for playing. You can say start over to try again, or quit to exit the game.

contents.narration: Here's the help menu. Make choices to navigate the story or you can tell me to start over or stop. Picking up where you left off.

<break time='1s'/>
    Its a {randomDayName}.
    To the right you see a long winding path. To the left is something sparkling in the distance.
    Do you want to go left towards the sparkles, or right down the path?

parameters.message: Do you want to go left towards the sparkles, or right down the path?

You see a path to your right, and sparkles to your left.
    Which way do you want to go.

contents.narration:
You walk towards the sparkles and find {foundCoins} shiny coins.
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/cloth_leather_paper/money_coins/money_coins_04'/>
<prosody volume='x-loud'>You walk down the path towards the beach and see a lost play toy. Do you want to keep it, or play with it.</prosody>

parameters.message: Would you like to keep it, or play with it.
You found some a play toy. Keep it, or play with it.

parameters.target: play with the play toy sound

contents.narration:
You decide to keep the play toy, you might want to play with it later.
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/magic_spells/magic_spells_14'/>

parameters.target: play and lose the play toy
play and keep the play toy

scenes.id: play with the play toy sound

contents.narration:
You're having a super fun time with the play toy, but then the wind sweeps it away. 
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_strong_wind_desert_01'/>
    Bye bye, poor poor play toy.

scenes.id: play and lose the play toy

contents.narration:
Oh what fun this play toy is. 
    You decide to keep it.
    It might come in handy later.
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/magic_spells/magic_spells_14'/>

scenes.id: play and keep the play toy

contents.narration:
<break time='1s'/>
    You are on your way to the city of Chastin. 
    You hope to get there before dark. 
    You see a small gnome digging through the grass. 
    Would you like to talk to the gnome, or keep walking?

parameters.message: Would you like to talk to the gnome, or keep walking?

You see a small gnome digging through the grass. 
    Would you like to talk to the gnome, or keep walking?

contents.narration:
You carry on down the path. 
    The gnome mumbles something and then produces a tiny golden key. 
    Do you return and talk to the gnome or keep walking?

parameters.message: Do you return and talk to the gnome or keep walking?

The gnome mumbles something and then produces a tiny golden key. 
    Do you return and talk to the gnome or keep walking?

contents.narration: <voice name='Justin'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='slow' pitch='x-high'>Aha</prosody></voice>, the gnome says. <voice name='Justin'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='slow' pitch='x-high'>I have found this tiny golden key. But I have no need for it. Maybe I can trade it in Chastin.</prosody></voice>

You remember that you have a play toy you found by the beach.
    That tiny golden key looks pretty important.
    Should you ask him to trade for it? Yes or no.

parameters.message: Should you ask him to trade for it? Yes or no.

The gnome has a tiny golden key that looks pretty important.
    Should you ask him to trade for it? Yes or no.

contents.narration:
You pull out the play toy you found and put it by the gnomes feet. He pauses, looks down, and then flashes a big grin. <voice name='Justin'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='slow' pitch='x-high'>Perfect. I have always wanted a play toy of my own!</prosody></voice>
    You recieve the tiny golden key!
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/magic_spells/magic_spells_14'/>
Digging through your inventory you realize that you have nothing to trade. Too bad.

Just up ahead in the distance you can see the flags of Chastin. 
    <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/alexa-ml/sounds/sound-library-loud/Instruments/Trumpet_1.mp3' />
    Soon you will be given your first mission.

<break time='1s'/>
    You move along enjoying the lush life, of Merry Falls.
    Up ahead you hear some voices in the trees.
    They don't sound very friendly.
    Do you keep going forward, or quickly hide.

parameters.message: Do you want to continue, or should you hide.

Up ahead you hear some unfriendly voices in the trees.
    Do you continue, or quickly hide.

contents.narration: Hoping its just some local youth hanging about, you quietly move along.

You quickly shuffle ahead and keep your eyes on the road.
    It sounds like some ruffians might be planning a robbery.
    luckily they dont seem to notice you.

<voice name='Vicki'><lang xml:lang='de-DE'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='medium' pitch='medium'>Hey {animalType}!</prosody></lang></voice> Someone says from the trees.
    You abruptly stop in your tracks.
    A ruffian stumbles up to you.
    <voice name='Vicki'><lang xml:lang='de-DE'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='medium' pitch='medium'>Give us all your coins. Be a good little {animalType}.</prosody></lang></voice>

Perhaps someone needs to teach these ruffians some manners.
    Do you want to pay them all your coins, or fight.

parameters.message: Pay the ruffians all your coins, or fight.

You have been surrounded by ruffians.
    You need to pay, or fight.

contents.narration:
You decide to pay the ruffians your {playerCoins} coins.
    <voice name='Vicki'><lang xml:lang='de-DE'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='medium' pitch='medium'>Nice doing business with you.</prosody></lang></voice>

You decide to stand your ground.
    Its time to take action.

You quietly merge into the trees to your right.
    The ruffians start stepping out from the darkness.
    <voice name='Vicki'><lang xml:lang='de-DE'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='medium' pitch='medium'>I thought I heard a {animalType} over there.</prosody></lang></voice>
<voice name='Vicki'><lang xml:lang='de-DE'><prosody volume='x-loud' rate='medium' pitch='medium'>I see a {animalType} over here. Get it!</prosody></lang></voice>
They start heading in your direction, but luckily pass you by.

<break time='1s'/>
    Until next time.

You currently have {playerHp} health points.
    Your attack is {playerHit}.
    Enemy currently has {varBattleEnemyHp} health points.
    enemy attack is {varBattleEnemyHit}.
Perpare for battle!
<voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>Do you want to attack, heal, or check info.</prosody></lang></voice>

parameters.message: <voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>Attack, heal, or check info.</prosody></lang></voice>
<voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>You are in battle. Do you want to attack, heal, or check info.</prosody></lang></voice>

contents.narration:
<voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>The {varBattleEnemyName} attacks!</prosody></lang></voice>
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/human/fight/fight_05'/>
    You were hit for {entityHitFor}.

<voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>The {varBattleEnemyName} attacks!</prosody></lang></voice>
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_swoosh_cartoon_fast_01'/>
    <voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>You dodged the attack!</prosody></lang></voice>

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/glass/crashes/crashes_02'/>
    <voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>Critial hit on the enemy!</prosody></lang></voice>
    <say-as interpret-as='interjection'>bravo</say-as>

<voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>{varBattleEnemyName} hit for {entityHitFor}.</prosody></lang></voice>
    <voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>{varBattleEnemyName} has {varBattleEnemyHp} health points remaining.</prosody></lang></voice>

You have been killed.
    ||
    You are dead friend.
    ||
    May you rest in piece.
<voice name='Amy'><lang xml:lang='en-GB'><prosody volume='x-loud'>The {varBattleEnemyName} was defeated.</prosody></lang></voice>

The battle is over.
    <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/alexa-ml/sounds/sound-library-loud/Instruments/Trumpet_1.mp3' />
You have {playerCoins} coins.

You were healed for {playerHealAmount} health points.
    You now have {playerHp} health points total.
    You currently have no health potions.
You dont have any health potions with you at the moment.
You have {playerHp} health points remaining.
You are currently carrying, {playToy}, {goldenKey}, {healthPotion}.
You currently have nothing in your inventory.
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/animals/amzn_sfx_cat_meow_1x_01'/>
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/animals/amzn_sfx_dog_small_bark_2x_01'/>
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/animals/amzn_sfx_cat_angry_screech_1x_01'/>
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/animals/amzn_sfx_dog_med_bark_2x_02'/>

You notice a small hole in some nearby bushes.
    Do you want to investigate the hole, or keep going.

parameters.message: Do you want to investigate the hole, or keep going.
You notice a small hole. Do you want to investigate, or keep going.

contents.narration:
You crawl your way through the hole into a beautiful, round grassy opening.
    In the middle sits a majestic wishing well.

Do you want to make a wish for one coin?
    ||
    Only one coin for one wish. How about it?
    ||
    You never know what you wish might be. Want to make one?
    ||
    Special things can happen at the wishing well. Do you want to throw a coin in?
    ||
    Toss a coin in. Its a wishing well. Are you ready?

parameters.message: Do you want to make a wish for one coin?

You are at the wishing well.
    Do you want to make a wish for one coin?

parameters.target: make a wish at the wishing well
got lucky at the wishing well
got unlucky at the wishing well
not enough coins for the wishing well

scenes.id: make a wish at the wishing well

contents.narration:
You dont have enough coins for the wishing well.
    Time to move on.

scenes.id: not enough coins for the wishing well

contents.narration:
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/cloth_leather_paper/money_coins/money_coins_04'/>
    <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/water/splash_water/splash_water_07'/>

Lady luck is on your side today.
    Your luck trait has increased, giving you a chance for critical hits.

scenes.id: got lucky at the wishing well

contents.narration:
Sorry. You were not so lucky at the well this time.
    ||
    Not so lucky. At least its just one coin.
    ||
    That is a shame. No luck at all.
    ||
    It could have been worse I suppose.
    ||
    Perhaps you should invest in a horse shoe.

scenes.id: got unlucky at the wishing well
